title: Admin namespace API `admin_addPeer` misbehave for local host
body:
**Describe the bug**
I am trying to run geth and nethermind locally and tries to connect both nodes. Interestingly if I connect nethermind to geth it works fine, but not the vise versa. 

**To Reproduce**
Here is a simplest possible scenario which is causing the problem. If we reverse the order means try to connect Nothermind to Geth it works fine. 

```ts
const identity = await gethNode.api.admin.nodeInfo();
await nethermindNode.api.admin.addPeer(identity.enode);
```

**Expected behavior**
Nethermind should accept the geth node identity and connect to it. 

**Screenshots**
It's causing following error. 

```
Uncaught exception: ErrorJsonRpcResponse: JSON RPC error: Internal error, admin_addPeer
    at parseRpcResponse (file:///jsonRpcHttpClient.ts:258:11)
    at JsonRpcHttpClient.fetch (file:///jsonRpcHttpClient.ts:110:12)
    at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>) {
  response: {
    jsonrpc: '2.0',
    error: {
      code: -32603,
      message: 'Internal error',
      data: "System.ArgumentException: Can't get Port for host 127.0.0.1.\n" +
        '   at Nethermind.Config.Enode..ctor(String enodeString) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Config/Enode.cs:line 63\n' +
        '   at Nethermind.Config.NetworkNode..ctor(String enode) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Config/NetworkNode.cs:line 35\n' +
        '   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.Modules.Admin.AdminRpcModule.admin_addPeer(String enode, Boolean addToStaticNodes) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.JsonRpc/Modules/Admin/AdminRpcModule.cs:line 93\n' +
        '   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.JsonRpcService.ExecuteAsync(JsonRpcRequest request, String methodName, ValueTuple`2 method, JsonRpcContext context) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.JsonRpc/JsonRpcService.cs:line 198\n' +
        '   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.JsonRpcService.ExecuteRequestAsync(JsonRpcRequest rpcRequest, JsonRpcContext context) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.JsonRpc/JsonRpcService.cs:line 117\n' +
        '   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.JsonRpcService.SendRequestAsync(JsonRpcRequest rpcRequest, JsonRpcContext context) in /src/Nethermind/Nethermind.JsonRpc/JsonRpcService.cs:line 87'
    },
    id: 8
  },
  payload: {
    method: 'admin_addPeer',
    params: [
      'enode://c14c6bc8e0bcb1e8391c5307eb2b8743da152806939889ff9ef26b930a4cbbc168e6021014930af4de35d795a4b27ef4b8f0519a26cf16149bb8fcd939556d4d@127.0.0.1:9056?discport=0'
    ]
  }
}
```

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Mac
 - Version: 13.0 (22A380)
